textAfterTable: Valuation HOLD. RITE AID CORP's P/E ratio indicates a significant discount compared to an average of 22.13 for the Food & Staples Retailing industry and a significant discount compared to the S&P 500 average of 21.18. For additional comparison, its price-to-book ratio of 58.44 indicates a significant premium versus the S&P 500 average of 2.82 and a significant premium versus the industry average of 4.45. The current price-to-sales ratio is well below the S&P 500 average and is also below the industry average, indicating a discount. The valuation analysis reveals that, RITE AID CORP seems to be trading at a discount to investment alternatives within the industry.
